dataList.name: W Corp. Standard Issue Cap
dataList.desc: After using a Skill that gains [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>, gain [EmergencyChargeForceField] equal to the Count gained (max 7 per Identity)

dataList.name: Cleanup Agent Gear Set C
dataList.desc:
After using a Skill that gains [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>, gain [EmergencyChargeForceField] equal to Count gained (max 7 per Identity)

Skills that consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse> deal +(number of Identities in the Team with Skills that gain or consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>)% damage (counts all units in the Team)

Skills that consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse> gain Clash Power +3 and deal +15% damage
- When using said Skills, the unit gains +4 [Charge] Count and 1 [ChargeForceField] (once per Identity per turn)

W Corp. Identities gain the following effects:
- When dealing damage with a Skill(including E.G.O Skills), inflict 2 [TakeHpHealReduce] (cannot Stack)
- During the combat phase, when this unit takes HP damage from sources other than direct Skill damage, gain 5 [ChargeForceField] (once per turn per Identity)
- Skill 2 gains Clash Power +3 and deals +15% damage
- Turn Start: for this turn, Skill 3 deals +(number of W Corp. Identities on the field x 6.25)% damage
- Turn Start: W Corp. L2 Agents gain 1 [PlusCoinValueUp]
- Turn Start: gain (number of W Corp. Identities on the field / 3) [ChargeLoad] (max 2; rounded down)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Skills that consume Charge Count deal more damage
Skill 1 gains Clash Power and deals more damage; gain Charge Count and Charge Barrier
Skill 2 gains Clash Power and deals more damage

dataList.name: Bloody Flesh, Fleshy Blood
dataList.desc:
This E.G.O Gift's effects are enhanced based on the number of Identities in the Team loadout with Attack Skills that consume [BloodDinner] (number of Identities that meet the condition represented by "N" below; except E.G.O Skills; counts all units in the Team)

First Turn Start of a wave: increase [BloodDinner] by (N x 20); then, apply 3 [Laceration] and +3 [Laceration] Count to all targets ([BloodDinner] increased by this effect is capped to 100 per activation)

Allies take -(N x 10%) [Laceration] damage (min 1 [Laceration] damage; max 40%)
- Reduced damage does not affect the amount of [BloodDinner] increased

Enemies take +(N x 5)% [Laceration] damage (max 20%)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Increase Bloodfeast and inflict Bleed & Bleed Count

dataList.name: Hardblood Glaive
dataList.desc:
This E.G.O Gift's effects are enhanced based on the number of Identities in the Team loadout with Attack Skills that consume [BloodDinner] (number of Identities that meet the condition represented by "N" below; except E.G.O Skills; counts all units in the Team)

Encounter Start: all allies gain (N - 2)[BloodArmorCasting] (max 3)

dataList.name: WB Flask
dataList.desc:
Activates when an ally with Attack Skills that inflict [Laceration] or <noparse>Unique Bleed</noparse> dies (once per wave; except E.G.O Skills; if more than 1 ally dies at once, use the highest-level ally among them)
- All allies heal (9% of the dead Identity) HP and increase [BloodDinner] by (dead Identity's level + 9)
- All allies gain (dead Identity's level / 9) [AttackUp] next turn (max 6; rounded down)

dataList.name: Sanguine Fragrance Descends
dataList.desc:
The ally with the least HP before Combat Start heals 3% HP On Hit with Attack Skills that apply [Laceration] or <noparse>Unique Bleed</noparse> (2 times per turn)

In a Clash using Skills that apply [Laceration] or <noparse>Unique Bleed</noparse> against enemies with [Laceration] or <noparse>Unique Bleed</noparse>, Clash Power +1
- If 5 or more Identities have Attack Skills that apply [Laceration] or <noparse>Unique Bleed</noparse>, Clash Power +1 and deal +10% damage instead (counts all units in the Team)
- If there are 10 or more Identities that fit the above description, Clash Power +2 and deal +15% damage instead

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Gain Clash Power or deal more damage

dataList.name: Discarded Dimensional Gauntlet
dataList.desc: When dealing damage against enemies with Skills that consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>, +0.1 to the lowest Attack Type Resist. for the turn (once per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Raise the lowest Attack Type Resistance

dataList.name: Discarded Dimensional Gauntlet+
dataList.desc:
When dealing damage against enemies with Skills that consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>, +0.1 to the lowest Attack Type Resist. for the turn (once per turn)
<style="upgradeHighlight">- Also, inflict 1 [VioletResistDown]</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Raise the lowest Attack Type Resistance

dataList.name: Discarded Dimensional Gauntlet++
dataList.desc:
When dealing damage against enemies with Skills that consume [Charge] Count or <noparse>Unique Charge</noparse>, +0.1 to the lowest Attack Type Resist. for the turn (<style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> times per turn)
- Also, inflict 1 [VioletResistDown] <style="upgradeHighlight">and 1 [AzureResistDown]</style>

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Raise the lowest Attack Type Resistance

dataList.name: Blue Starshard
dataList.desc:
Enemies in Low Morale or Panic states lose 1 Final Power (against targets without SP, when they have 25+ [Sinking])
- When dealing damage against the affected enemies with Skills that apply [Sinking], [Sinking] Count, or <noparse>Unique Sinking</noparse>, inflict 2 [DefenseDown] (2 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Reduce target's Final Power; On Hit, inflict Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Blue Starshard+
dataList.desc:
Enemies in Low Morale or Panic states lose <style="upgradeHighlight">2</style> Final Power (against targets without SP, when they have <style="upgradeHighlight">15</style>+ [Sinking])
- When dealing damage against the affected enemies with Skills that apply [Sinking], [Sinking] Count, or <noparse>Unique Sinking</noparse>, inflict <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> [DefenseDown] (2 times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Reduce target's Final Power; On Hit, inflict Defense Level Down

dataList.name: Blue Starshard++
dataList.desc:
Enemies in Low Morale or Panic states lose <style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> Final Power (against targets without SP, when they have <style="upgradeHighlight">10</style>+ [Sinking])
- When dealing damage against the affected enemies with Skills that apply [Sinking], [Sinking] Count, or <noparse>Unique Sinking</noparse>, inflict 3 [DefenseDown] (<style="upgradeHighlight">3</style> times per turn)

simpleDesc.simpleDesc: Reduce target's Final Power; On Hit, inflict Defense Level Down
